). — revolver_cohort" />
revolver 0.3.0
  • Reference

Construct a REVOLVER cohort object (S3 class "rev_cohort").

revolver_cohort.Rd

Construct a REVOLVER cohort object (S3 class "rev_cohort").

revolver_cohort(dataset, CCF_parser = revolver::CCF_parser,
  options = list(ONLY.DRIVER = FALSE, MIN.CLUSTER.SIZE = 10),
  annotation = "My REVOLVER dataset")

Arguments

dataset

A dataframe in the specified format (see Online manual).
CCF_parser

A function to parse the format for the encoding of CCF or binary values for each sequenced region. A possible function is available inside REVOLVER; revolver::CCF_parser (the default of this parameter).
options

A list of 2 parameters that should be a boolean value for ONLY.DRIVER (use only driver SNVs), and MIN.CLUSTER.SIZE, the minimum cluster size.
annotation

String for annotation of this cohort. This will be prompted in every print for this object.

Value

An object of class "rev_cohort"

Examples

data(CRC)
#> Warning: data set ‘CRC’ not found
cohort = revolver_cohort(CRC, options = list(ONLY.DRIVER = FALSE, MIN.CLUSTER.SIZE = 0))
#>  [ REVOLVER Cohort constructor ] 
#> ◉  Use only drivers 0 
#> ◉ Min. cluster size 0 
#> 
#> Error in lapply(X = X, FUN = FUN, ...): object 'CRC' not found

# Example cohort creation with the TRACERx data
data(TRACERx_data)

# To speed up the process we use only 2 patients
TRACERx_data = TRACERx_data %>%
   filter(patientID %in% c('CRUK0001', 'CRUK0002'))

cohort = revolver_cohort(TRACERx_data, annotation = 'A toy REVOLVER dataset')
#>  [ REVOLVER Cohort constructor ] 
#> ◉  Use only drivers 0 
#> ◉ Min. cluster size 10 
#> 
#> =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
#>  Checking size of each patient's cluster -- removing those below cutoff.
#> =-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
#> Rows before filtering: 2380 
#> 
#> Removed
#>

#> 
#> Rows after filtering: 2380

# The S3 print/ plot for this cohort
print(cohort)
#>  [ REVOLVER - Repeated Evolution in Cancer ] 
#> 
#> Dataset : A toy REVOLVER dataset 
#> Cohort  : 2 patients, 2380 variants and 13 driver events. 
#>
